revision.text:
{{Infobox Key Item |name = Coin Case |image = [[File:CoinCase_HighRes.png]] |caption = Artwork of the ''Coin Case''. |use = A case for holding Money |obtain = After first Pokémon caught }} ===Description=== A case for holding money. ===Acquisition=== Choose your starter Pokémon and defeat it. Professor Oak will subsequently give it to you. ===Effects=== Allows the storage of [[Pokémon Dollars]] {{pdollar}}.

{{Key Items}} [[Category:Key Items]] [[Category:Items]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
